title: Children born to parents not married to each other
context: §574-3 Children born to parents not married to each other. The registrar of births shall register any child born to parents not married to each other at the time of the child&rsquo;s birth and where either the natural parents have not married each other or where the parent and child relationship has not been established pursuant to chapter 584, as having both a family name and given name chosen by the mother. [L 1860, p 32, §3; RL 1925, §3121; RL 1935, §4665; RL 1945, §12386; RL 1955, §327-3; am L 1967, c 6, §2; HRS §574-3; am L 1980, c 153, §2; am L 1989, c 75, §3; am L 1997, c 52, §6] Cross References Birth certificates, see §338-21.
